pages.text: Schematics are the foundation of every tool part. They define the shape, function and stats of a tool part. Schematics are required in order to create different parts, and can be found scattered around the world.

pages.title: Crafting
pages.text: If you already have an existing tool part, you can create a schematic from it by combining it with a piece of paper in the crafting table

pages.title: Looting
pages.text: Only the basic schematics can be crafted from existing tools. If you want to better schematics, you have to head out into the world and explore. Schematics have different rarities, and will appear in different loot chests depending on their rarity

pages.title: Using the schematic
pages.text: Schematics are used to craft parts. Every schematic will craft a unique tool part when combined with the appropriate amount of material, which is listed in the description.
